Package io.sphere.sdk.utils

Provides utilities for miscellaneous things.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompletableFutureUtils
    Tools to simplify the work with CompletionStage and CompletableFuture.
    HighPrecisionMoneyImpl
    A variant of MoneyImpl, this class can be used when the user intends to pass to high precision price, the fractions taken into account can be specified in fractions digits, and it allows to fractionDigits up or down the default precision for a particular price.
    MoneyImpl  
    SphereInternalLogger
    Internal logging used by the sphere Java client itself.
    SphereInternalUtils  

Package io.sphere.sdk.utils Description

Provides utilities for miscellaneous things.
